list_feature: Company Overview: Detailed information about ITT's history, mission, values, and global presence.

Business Segments: Dedicated sections for each of ITT's business segments (e.g., Industrial Process, Motion Technologies, Connect and Control Technologies), outlining their specific offerings and target markets.
Products & Solutions: Comprehensive catalog of ITT's products and solutions, with detailed specifications, datasheets, application examples, and high-quality images/videos.
Industries Served: Information on the various industries ITT caters to, showcasing relevant products and solutions for each industry.
Investor Relations: Section for investors, including financial reports, stock information, corporate governance details, and investor presentations.
News & Events: Press releases, news articles, industry event participation, and company announcements.
Sustainability: Information on ITT's commitment to sustainability, including environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives and performance metrics.
Careers: Job postings, information about ITT's culture, employee benefits, and career development opportunities.
Aftermarket Services: Information on ITT's aftermarket services, such as repair, maintenance, spare parts, and training.
Engineering Support: Details on ITT's engineering support capabilities, including design, testing, and consulting services.
Custom Solutions: Information on ITT's ability to provide custom-engineered solutions to meet specific customer requirements.
Training Programs: Details on available training programs for ITT products and solutions.
Contact Forms: Forms for general inquiries, sales requests, and technical support.
Interactive Product Configurators: Tools to help users configure and select the right ITT products for their applications.
Resource Library: Downloadable resources such as brochures, catalogs, technical documents, case studies, and white papers.
Blog/Articles: Regularly updated blog or articles on industry trends, ITT innovations, and application insights.
Social Media Integration: Links to ITT's social media profiles (e.g., LinkedIn, Twitter, YouTube).
Webinars/Events: Promotion and registration for upcoming webinars and industry events.
Customer Portal: Secure portal for customers to access order information, track shipments, and manage accounts.
FAQ Section: Answers to frequently asked questions about ITT products, services, and the company.
Technical Support: Information on how to contact ITT's technical support team, including phone numbers, email addresses, and online support portals.
Warranty Information: Details on ITT's product warranties and how to file a warranty claim.
Distributor Locator: Tool to find authorized ITT distributors in specific geographic areas.
Chatbot: AI-powered chatbot to provide instant answers to common questions.
